# WKAlertControllerStyle.alert

**Case**

An alert sheet with stacked buttons. The alert sheet includes a default Cancel button at the bottom of the sheet. You can add other buttons, which are placed above the Cancel button.

## Declaration

```swift
case alert
```

## Constants

- **WKAlertControllerStyle.sideBySideButtonsAlert**: An alert sheet with side-by-side buttons.
- **WKAlertControllerStyle.actionSheet**: An action sheet style. Action sheets are modal sheets that can be dismissed using the Cancel button in the top-left corner of the sheet. You can also add one or two custom buttons to perform related tasks.
